Fitting SciKit
==============

A framework for fitting functions to data with SciPy which unifies the various
available interpolation methods and provides a common interface to them.

Source
------
https://github.com/ludwigschwardt/scikits.fitting

Installation from source
------------------------

The SciKit may be installed globally using

python setup.py install

or locally using

python setup.py install --prefix=${HOME}

If you prefer, you can use it without installing, by simply adding
this path to your PYTHONPATH variable and compiling the extensions::

  python setup.py build_ext -i
